title: Survivor

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the end of the game

desc:
Post -2908
A war veteran who failed and ran away.
*Duwiiton made this role on 8/24/2019 and I think it's still funny and needlessly complicated*
Abilities -
None
Attributes -
- At night, you will have nightmares.
- You have 4 vests which you cannot use.
- If you successfully go through a nightmare, you will gain powerful defense for the night and use a vest.
- You regenerate a vest every full moon, but only if you didn't fail the nightmare the night prior.
- If you die in a nightmare, you will lose a vest. If you die 3 times from the nightmare, you will die in the main game from guilt.
- During a nightmare, your scene will cut to 13 "players" (controlled by the host)
- There will be 6 "players" on your side (aside from you) and 7 on the enemy. You will have the "Commander" Role card, seen below.
- The players all have the name "Ally" or "Enemy" with a number at the end. Each one will say something in your night chat. If there is a Jailor or Medium which is Seancing you, they can see all of your night messages from the nightmare.
- All "Players" will say something. (The host copy and pastes one of these messages)
- The voicelines will all pertain to who they are attacking.
- If you do not attack anyone, you will fail the nightmare.
- If you fail to attack the right person, you will fail the nightmare. You can find the right person to attack by looking in chat.
- Your allies will all say who they will attack. You must attack the enemy who isn't being attacked.
